title: E-Commerce
description: This is a modern e-commerce application built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. It features a responsive design, product catalog, shopping cart functionality, checkout process, and a provider portal for order management.

title: CRUD
description: A full-stack CRUD application for managing events built with React, TypeScript, and Node.js.

title: Finance App
description: Track your finances with style using this full-stack finance tracking application built with FastAPI and React!

title: Chat Bot
description: Runs in CLI mode for interactive chat or API mode via a web server (Flask or similar). Designed for flexibility with environment isolation, easy dependency management, and configurable ports.
